example.parse: (S (CONJ و) (VP (PRT (VERB_PART قد)) (PV+PVSUFF_SUBJ:3FS تفجرت) (NP-SBJ (DET+NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_NOM القضية)) (NP-TMP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_ACC بعد) (NP (NP (NP (NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_PL+CASE_INDEF_GEN تصريحات)) (PP (PREP ل) (NP (NP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN محافظ) (NP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN شمال) (NP (NOUN_PROP+CASE_INDEF_GEN سيناء))))

arg.g: After comments by the Governor of North Sinai
